definition: to move/to shift/to change/to alter/to remove

sentences.english: Or the documented cases of methane migration?
sentences.chinese: 或者說是記錄在冊的甲烷運移的案例呢？

sentences.english: Pinghu fault is the main passage for the vertical migration of oil and gas.
sentences.chinese: 平湖斷裂是天然氣垂向運移的主要通道。

sentences.english: The characteristics of biomarkers reveal that the oil has a certain migration effects.
sentences.chinese: 生物標誌物特徵顯示原油具有一定的運移效應。

sentences.english: Magmas in transit to the surface will further supplement this heat .
sentences.chinese: 向地表運移的岩漿將進一步補充這種熱量。

sentences.english: The chassis uses the self-propelled – like vehicle to carry, the complete bikes relocation, the migration is good .
sentences.chinese: 底盤採用自走式車載形式，整車搬遷，運移性好。

sentences.english: The transport of atrazine in soil was investigated with soil column experiments.
sentences.chinese: 用土柱實驗模擬莠去津在土壤中的運移。

sentences.english: This oil migration direction of Xifeng Oilfield is consistent with the distribution of subsurface fluid pressure of the studied area.
sentences.chinese: 這種油氣運移方向與研究區流體壓力的指向一致。

sentences.english: Migration fractionation can form derived condensate and residual oil.
sentences.chinese: 運移分餾作用可以產生衍生凝析油和殘餘油。

sentences.english: Gas migration phase is an important factor influencing gas accumulation and distribution.
sentences.chinese: 天然氣運移相態是影響其運聚成藏的重要因素。

sentences.english: Migration phase state is the main mark of the character of migration.
sentences.chinese: 運移相態是運移特徵的主要標誌。

sentences.english: Sandbody is the main transporting passage of oil or gas through strata.
sentences.chinese: 沿砂體運移是油氣側向不穿層運移的主要輸導通道。

sentences.english: Oil in the Shijiutuo Uplift and the inclined end migrated from northwest.
sentences.chinese: 石臼坨凸起及傾沒端油氣是從西北方向運移和注入的。

sentences.english: While it decreased rapidly with transport distance of nitrate-N, presenting power relation.
